title: Which is the best song of 2019? - Quora

response.answer_text: My favorite song has changed so much this year. I’ll see if I can think of my favorite each month. I know some of my favorites this year, just need to remember when they were my favorites. January Sweet But Pyscho by Ava Max Let’s just say that my one friend played this song too much around me and it kinda stuck. February Smells Like Teen Spirit by Nirvana I still enjoy this song, but at the time I was playing a singing game with my friends and we sang this one like 50 times. March March was my Avril Lavigne stage of 2019. Not sure which to call my favorite though. It’s either What the Hell or Here’s to Never Growing Up or Girlfriend or Smile or anything, just not Sk8er B0i even though I love it, just not my fave. April Did I have a favorite in April????? I think April was just me listening to many different things. I don’t know…. May Forever and Always by Taylor Swift This song just happened to be my favorite coincidentally. There are details that I don’t want to share. June Pretty much everything from the new Aladdin soundtrack. The entire month of June. Then I got to go see it for my birthday. July My Beatles stage. I’d probably say my favorite was Ob-La-Di or Yesterday. August Never Surrender by Corey Hart I had like just finished watching Stranger Things 3, and was listening to my 80s station on Pandora. This song came on, and I realized it was from Stranger Things and I almost cried. The song is just so fitting. September Every Breath You Take by the Police Still on my 80s/Stranger Things kick. Love love love this song still. It played at swim practice and I didn’t want to keep swimming. I wanted to sing so loud, but didn’t. October Burn the Ships by For King and Country I still love this song, but in October I heard it so much. (more than other music) November Pumped Up Kicks by Foster the People I first listened to this song in October, towards the end. And I LOVED it so much. I don’t know why. December 3 AM by Meghan Trainor or No Good For You by Meghan Trainor My friend just introduced me to these songs. THEY ARE SO GOOD! ~~~ There you have it… My favorite/s for each month of the year. Overall favorite???? I have to say either the Meghan Trainor, Beatles, Taylor Swift, or Never Surrender. It’s too hard to choose. Mandy

The best song of this year is probably EARTH by Lil Dicky.  This song tells us about the dancers our beautiful planet is facing . Lil Dicky got multiple artists together for a song about climate change.It is Justin Bieber's newest song in years.It also features Ariana Grande, Shawn Mendes, Miley Cyrus and more.All the proceeds go to the Leonardo DiCaprio Foundation.Only Lil Dicky can get all of our favorite artists together for a song about saving the planet. Justin Bieber, Ariana Grande, Shawn Mendes, and more came together to sing the song and help raise awareness about climate change. All the proceeds from the song are going to the Leonardo DiCaprio Foundation, to help other smaller organizations get the funds they need to help save the world. The singers are Justin Bieber Ariana Grande Halsey Zac Brown Brendon Urie Hailee Steinfeld Wiz Khalifa Kevin Hart Snoop Dogg Adam Levine Shawn Mendes Charlie Puth Sia Miley Cyrus Lil Jon Rita Ora Miguel Katy Perry Lil Yachty Ed Sheeran Meghan Trainor Joel Embiid PSY Bad Bunny Kris Wu Lil Dicky Even Leo de Caprio himself said in this song that it is his favourite. Listen to the song and tell me in the comments how it is like. Please Upvote
